languages.text: "Длительная коммуникация с мирянами высокого социального ранга вызывает у данной единицы //раздражение//желание принудительного прекращения жизненных функций//, //скорбь//ослабление мотивации//, //праведную ярость//стремление к активации протокола чистоты//. Нахождение в локации ремонта и обслуживания священных машин благотворно влияет на когнитивные функции данной единицы".

"Prolonged communication with laypeople of high social standing causes this unit //vexation//desire for forceful cessation of vital functions//, //grief//decline in motivation//, //righteous fury//willingness to initiate purity protocol//. Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."
languages.original_text: "Длительная коммуникация с мирянами высокого социального ранга вызывает у данной единицы //раздражение//желание принудительного прекращения жизненных функций//, //скорбь//ослабление мотивации//, //праведную ярость//стремление к активации протокола чистоты//. Нахождение в локации ремонта и обслуживания священных машин благотворно влияет на когнитивные функции данной единицы".

traits.locale_text: "Prolonged communication with laypeople of high social standing causes this unit vexation/desire for forceful cessation of vital functions, grief/decline in motivation, righteous fury/willingness to initiate purity protocol. Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."

"Prolonged communication with laypeople of high social standing causes this unit vexation/desire for forceful cessation of vital functions, grief/decline in motivation, righteous fury/willingness to initiate purity protocol. Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."

Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."

Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."

"Prolonged communication with laypeople of high social standing causes this unit //vexation//desire for forceful cessation of vital functions//, //grief//decline in motivation//, //righteous fury//willingness to initiate purity protocol//. Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."

languages.text: 「社会的地位の高い一般人との長時間のコミュニケーションは本ユニットに//不満//生命機能の強制的停止の希望//、//悲嘆//意欲の減退//、//正義の怒り//浄化プロトコルを開始する意欲//を引き起こさせます。神聖な機械の修理やメンテナンスが行われる場所に留まることは、本ユニットの認知機能にとって有益であります」
languages.original_text: "Prolonged communication with laypeople of high social standing causes this unit //vexation//desire for forceful cessation of vital functions//, //grief//decline in motivation//, //righteous fury//willingness to initiate purity protocol//. Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."

traits.locale_text: 「社会的地位の高い一般人との長時間のコミュニケーションは本ユニットに//不満//生命機能の強制的停止の希望//、//悲嘆//意欲の減退//、//正義の怒り//浄化プロトコルを開始する意欲//を引き起こさせます。神聖な機械の修理やメンテナンスが行われる場所に留まることは、本ユニットの認知機能にとって有益であります」

languages.text: “长期与社会地位高的教外人士交流，导致本单位//烦恼//希望强行终止重要功能//，//悲伤//动力下降//，//正义之怒//愿意启动净化协议//。留在修理和维护神圣机器的区域，对本单位的认知功能有益。”
languages.original_text: "Prolonged communication with laypeople of high social standing causes this unit //vexation//desire for forceful cessation of vital functions//, //grief//decline in motivation//, //righteous fury//willingness to initiate purity protocol//. Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."

traits.locale_text: “长期与社会地位高的教外人士交流，导致本单位//烦恼//希望强行终止重要功能//，//悲伤//动力下降//，//正义之怒//愿意启动净化协议//。留在修理和维护神圣机器的区域，对本单位的认知功能有益。”

languages.text: «La comunicación prolongada con sujetos laicos de alto estrato social provoca en esta unidad: //vejación//deseo de cese forzoso de funciones vitales//, //dolor//disminución de la motivación//, //furia justiciera//voluntad de iniciar protocolo de pureza//. Permanecer en una zona de reparación y mantenimiento para máquinas sagradas aporta beneficios a las funciones cognitivas de esta unidad».
languages.original_text: "Prolonged communication with laypeople of high social standing causes this unit //vexation//desire for forceful cessation of vital functions//, //grief//decline in motivation//, //righteous fury//willingness to initiate purity protocol//. Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."

traits.locale_text: «La comunicación prolongada con sujetos laicos de alto estrato social provoca en esta unidad: //vejación//deseo de cese forzoso de funciones vitales//, //dolor//disminución de la motivación//, //furia justiciera//voluntad de iniciar protocolo de pureza//. Permanecer en una zona de reparación y mantenimiento para máquinas sagradas aporta beneficios a las funciones cognitivas de esta unidad».

languages.text: « Les communications prolongées avec des profanes de haut rang provoquent chez cette unité //un agacement//un désir d'arrêt brutal de toute fonction vitale//, //de la peine//une baisse de motivation//, //une colère légitime//une envie de déclencher son protocole de purification//. Rester dans une zone de réparation et d'entretien des machines sacrées est bénéfique aux fonctions cognitives de cette unité. »
languages.original_text: "Prolonged communication with laypeople of high social standing causes this unit //vexation//desire for forceful cessation of vital functions//, //grief//decline in motivation//, //righteous fury//willingness to initiate purity protocol//. Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."

traits.locale_text: « Les communications prolongées avec des profanes de haut rang provoquent chez cette unité //un agacement//un désir d'arrêt brutal de toute fonction vitale//, //de la peine//une baisse de motivation//, //une colère légitime//une envie de déclencher son protocole de purification//. Rester dans une zone de réparation et d'entretien des machines sacrées est bénéfique aux fonctions cognitives de cette unité. »

languages.text: "Längere Kommunikation mit Laien hohen Standes wecken bei dieser Einheit //Verdruss//den Wunsch nach gewaltsamer Unterbrechung von Lebensfunktionen//, //Frustration//Motivationsverlust//, //aufrechten Zorn//den Wunsch nach Initialisierung des Reinheitsprotokolls//. Sich in einem Bereich zur Reparatur und Wartung heiliger Maschinen aufzuhalten, ist den kognitiven Funktionen dieser Einheit zuträglich."
languages.original_text: "Prolonged communication with laypeople of high social standing causes this unit //vexation//desire for forceful cessation of vital functions//, //grief//decline in motivation//, //righteous fury//willingness to initiate purity protocol//. Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."

traits.locale_text: "Längere Kommunikation mit Laien hohen Standes wecken bei dieser Einheit //Verdruss//den Wunsch nach gewaltsamer Unterbrechung von Lebensfunktionen//, //Frustration//Motivationsverlust//, //aufrechten Zorn//den Wunsch nach Initialisierung des Reinheitsprotokolls//. Sich in einem Bereich zur Reparatur und Wartung heiliger Maschinen aufzuhalten, ist den kognitiven Funktionen dieser Einheit zuträglich."

languages.text: "Yüksek sosyal mevkiye sahip avamlarla uzun süre iletişim kurmak, bu birimde //bunalmaya//hayati işlevleri zor kullanarak kesme arzusuna//, //kedere//motivasyon kaybına//, //haklı bir öfkeye//saflık protokolünü devreye sokma isteğine// yol açmaktadır. Kutsal makinelerin onarım ve bakımının yapıldığı bir bölgede bulunmak, bu birimin bilişsel işlevleri açısından faydalı olmaktadır."
languages.original_text: "Prolonged communication with laypeople of high social standing causes this unit //vexation//desire for forceful cessation of vital functions//, //grief//decline in motivation//, //righteous fury//willingness to initiate purity protocol//. Remaining in an area of repair and maintenance of sacred machines is beneficial to this unit's cognitive functions."

traits.locale_text: "Yüksek sosyal statüye sahip avamlarla uzun süre iletişim kurmak, bu birimde //sinirlenmeye//hayati fonksiyonları zorla devre dışı bırakma isteğine//, //kedere//motivasyon kaybına//, //haklı bir öfkeye//saflık protokolünü devreye sokma isteğine// yol açıyor. Kutsal makinelerin onarımı ve bakımını yapan bir bölgede bulunmak, bu birimin bilişsel fonksiyonları için faydalı oluyor."
